result.execSummary:
The defendant Scott Howard Penass was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 3rd Degree Sexual Assault [Modifiers: Penalties for Felonies-Class "G" Felony], a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $518 costs, including $250 DNA surcharge.    If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
9 years prison, 4 years initial confinement followed by 5 years extended supervision.

Comply with reporting requirments for sex offenders as per statues.

Any examinations requested per DOC.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Scott Howard Penass

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: notice of right to seek postconviction relief.

Defendant Scott Howard Penass in court , in custody, with attorney Chris A. Gramstrup.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Poquette makes statement- finds PSI recommendations for sentencing to be too lenient, feels offense deserves prison and extended supervision.  Victim makes statement.   Atty Gramstrup makes statement, agrees with recommendations of PSI.  Defendant makes statement.
Court makes statement and sentences Defendant:  9 years prison with 4 years initial confinement and 5 years extended supervision.  Credit for 282 days time served.  DEF not eligible for either Challenge Incarceration nor Substance Abuse Program.
NO CONTACT with victim.  Any Examinations as recommended by DOC.  Comply with any sex offender reporting requirements per statutes.  Costs $518.
Request from WI Dept. of Corrections for extension of deadline for filing of PSI report until 12/23/15.  Request approved.  Sentencing hearing set for 01/12/16 @ 1:30 pm.

Defendant Scott Howard Penass in court with attorney Chris A. Gramstrup.  Defendant Scott Howard Penass in custody.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  10:06 Am  Court calls case and recites appearances.  Amended information tendered to the court - court accepts.  State will be requesting a PSI and will be free to argue sentencing.  Court questions defendant re: plea questionnaire.  Defendant entered plea of no contest.   Court finds defendant guilty - PSI ordered - Long form no agent need appear.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for December 7, 2015 at 02:00 pm.  Bail is revoked
Faxed notice of plea hearing rescheduling from Atty Gramstrup
DE attorney requested to reset PLEA hearing from 09/08/15 - ok w/DA.  Moved to 09/17/15 @ 10 am.  DE attorney will send notice to parties.

Defendant Scott Howard Penass in court, in custody.  Attorney Gramstrup by phone.  Bruce Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Close to agreement  Plea hearing scheduled for September 8, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Scott Howard Penass in court, in custody, with attorney Chris A. Gramstrup.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
DEF acknowledges receipt of information, pleads Not Guilty, plea NG entered by court.  Atty Gramstrup requests 10 days to file any motions, granted by court.  Bail continues.
 Scheduling conference scheduled for July 14, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Scott Howard Penass in court, in custody, with attorney Chris A. Gramstrup.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
DEF advised of rights, DEF waives Preliminary Hearing.  State files an Information and hearing moves to Arraignment.  Arraignment scheduled for May 26, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Scott Howard Penass in court via video with attorney Chris A. Gramstrup.  Defendant Scott Howard Penass in custody.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    DEF satisfied with video.  Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint.  Time limits waived for preliminary hearing.  Bond contiues.  Jail to check on DNA sample.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 26, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Scott Howard Penass not in court, in custody, with attorney Chris A. Gramstrup.  .  John Martin Yackel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DEF in jail medical emergency.  Initial appearance scheduled for May 5, 2015 at 08:30 am.
